channel.description: Recent content in Ray on mostlymaths.net

item.title: Ray: Another way to distribute work in a cluster
item.description: A new entry on the data papers series. Ray is a distributed framework for next generation AI applications. What does this mean? A scam? Blockchain on AI? Nah, it’s actually pretty cool, it has actors.
